string-array.name: menu
string-array.item: Burrito - Choose chicken, steak, or vegetarian with your favorite ingredients.
Burrito Bowl - White or brown rice with a choice of protein and any toppings.
Nachos - House made chips topped with your protein choice and any toppings.
Tacos - Soft or hard tortillas filled with fresh ingredients of your picking.
Salad - Romaine lettuce with tortilla strips and protein, mixed with veggies.
Quesadilla - Chicken, steak, or just cheese and any veggies, grilled to perfection.
Tortilla Soup - Our signature soup topped with tortilla strips and sour cream.

string-array.name: sides
string-array.item: Chips and Salsa - House made chips with our freshly chopped pico de gallo salsa.
Chips and Guacamole - House made chips with our hand-smashed guacamole.
Chips and Queso - House made chips with our warm four cheese queso.
Cookie - Warm chocilate chip cookies made fresh by the hour.
Brownie - Chocolate fudge brownies that are warm and ready to eat.
Fountain Drink - Your choice of drink from our selection.

string-array.name: deals
string-array.item: First Order BOGO Entrees - By your first entree and get one for free!
Free Chips and Salsa with Purchase of $10+ - Get our favorite side with your purchase.
Free Cookie or Fountain Drink - Choose a free side item with your next purchase.
